= KindEditor 4.0 API =

== 函数模式 ==
 * KE.show - show editor (init and create editor if no editor)
 * KE.hide - hide editor (init and create editor if no editor)
 * KE.init - get/set config params
 * KE.textarea - get/set textarea element
 * KE.create - create editor
 * KE.remove - remove editor
 * KE.toolbar - get/set toolbar
 * KE.toggleToolbar - 
 * KE.design - change to design mode
 * KE.source - change to source mode
 * KE.readonly - readonly
 * KE.statusbar - get/set statusbar
 * KE.dialog - get/set dialog
 * KE.save - save html to textarea
 * KE.html - get/set html
 * KE.text - get/set text
 * KE.selectedHtml - get/set selected range
 * KE.selectedText - get/set selected range
 * KE.wrap - wrap tags for selected range
 * KE.strip - strip tags and attributes for selected range

{{{
KE.show('editor_1', {
    textarea : document.getElementById('content_1'),
}); 
}}}

== 对象模式 ==

{{{
var editor = KE('editor_1').hide().hideToolbar().hideStatusbar().show();
var html = editor.html();
}}}
